david.description: Working with Nordic Data Compliance Centre exceeded our expectations. Their consulting services were professional, timely, and efficient.

sarah.description: Nordic Data Compliance Centre's expertise helped streamline our processes. Their team was responsive and dedicated to our success.

conductRiskAssessments.title: Conduct the necessary ongoing risk assessments for current and new operations
conductRiskAssessments.description: We conduct the necessary ongoing risk assessments for current and new operations

basicInformationSecurity.title: Basic information security
basicInformationSecurity.description: Maintain a basic information security program based on legal requirements, international standards and ongoing risk assessments and risk tolerance (e.g. security policy, security measures, contingency plan etc.)

governanceStructure.title: Governance structure
description: We manage on your behalf the governance structure in the company, including ongoing support to the employees that are responsible for data compliance
We perform an assessment toghether with you in order to find the high risk compliance areas that needs your full attention
We schedule an online onboarding to get things started
We are available 24/7 and reach out to you as soon as possilble. We assess your needs and reach out faster for a data breach case than for a more general question
We believe that is very important for you to stay informed on the compliance efforts. We always assess the current situation and do not wait 3 months to inform you on issues that needs your attention

personalDataInventory.title: Personal data inventory and data transfer mechanisms
description: We manage on your behalf the RoPA (record of processing activities, GDPR Art.30), including data transfer mechanism
We monitor and implement new compliance requirements and best practices

We believe that is very important for you to stay informed on the compliance efforts. We always assess the current situation and do not wait 3 months to inform you on issues that needs your attention

description: We manage on your behalf the necessary internal policies, processes and procedures (e.g. employee privacy policy, before-during-after employment, CCTV etc.)
Manage privacy and security by design into new operations (e.g. ensure that new projects and processing activities follow data compliance principles)
Conduct periodic testing and report the effectiveness

description: We manage on your behalf the necessary external policies and notices to individuals consistent with data compliance regulations and operational risk tolerance, including the direct marketing and electronic communications areas (e.g. website, newsletter, social media campaigns etc.)

respondToRequests.title: Respond to requests and complaints from individuals
respondToRequests.description: Respond to individuals requests (e.g. deletion, access)

vendorManagement.title: Vendor management
vendorManagement.description: Manage the record of all data processors, sub-processors and joint controllers

incidentManagement.title: Incident management
incidentManagement.description: Management of personal data breach cases including notification to the Data Protection Agency and communication to individuals, if necessary

trainingAndAwareness.title: Training and awareness program
trainingAndAwareness.description: Providing ongoing online training for employees to promote data compliance and to mitigate operational risks

pointOfContact.title: Point of contact for local Data Protection Agency and assisting in a potential audit from local Data Protection Agency
pointOfContact.description: We are the point of contact for your local Data Protection Agency and we assist you in a potential audit from your local Data Protection Agency

gdprLightImplementation.title: GDPR Light implementation
gdprLightImplementation.description: We provide a light implementation and is used by our clients that already have done some implementation.

gdprTotalImplementation.title: GDPR Total implementation
gdprTotalImplementation.description: We provide a total implementation and is used by our clients that need to implement everything.

createAndImplementProcess.title: Create and implement process and procedure for individuals rights and complaints
createAndImplementProcess.description: Creating and implementing this process is crucial for your data compliance success

createAndImplementVendorManagement.title: Create and implement vendor management process
createAndImplementVendorManagement.description: Creating and implementing a vendor management process is key in your data compliance success

createAndImplementBasicInformationSecuri.title: Create and implement a basic information security program
createAndImplementBasicInformationSecuri.description: It is crucial to have at least basic information security implemented in your organisation

createAndImplementRopa.title: Create and implement ROPA (record of processing activities, GDPR Art.30)
createAndImplementRopa.description: Creating and implementing RoPA takes a lot of work and expertise to do it once and do it right

createAndImplementGovernanceStructure.title: Create and implement governance structure including basic data compliance training to the data compliance responsibles
createAndImplementGovernanceStructure.description: Without a proper governance structure in your organization no data compliance initiative will stick

createAndImplementIncidentManagement.title: Create and implement incident management process
createAndImplementIncidentManagement.description: When you have an incident you better have a data breach process that will guide what do to, how to assess your breach, who to get involved etc.

interimServices.title: DATA COMPLIANCE INTERIM SERVICES
text: Our interim data compliance consultants offer a flexible, high-performing solution for managing compliance, improving data security practices, and reducing risks associated with data compliance.
We provide immediate expertise and flexibility, ideal for both short-term and long-term strategic data compliance needs.
We have extensive knowledge of data compliance laws, best practices, and industry-specific requirements.

immediateSupport.title: Immediate compliance Support
immediateSupport.description: We help companies reduce compliance risks quickly, addressing urgent needs such as data breach responses, risk assessments, and audits.

policyDevelopment.title: Policy Development and Documentation
policyDevelopment.description: We assist with creating and refining privacy policies, data handling procedures, and security documentation to align with regulatory standards.

riskAssessment.title: Risk Assessment and Mitigation
riskAssessment.description: Our Interim consultants perform data protection impact assessments (DPIAs), risk assessments, and gap analyses.

training.title: Training and Awareness Programs
training.description: Data protection consultants often design and deliver training for employees on topics like data protection and breach prevention.

dataBreach.title: Data Breach Response and Incident Management
dataBreach.description: Our consultants can lead or advise on data breach responses, ensuring swift and compliant handling of incidents.

securityByDesign.title: Support or hands-on for Data Protection and Security by Design
securityByDesign.description: Interim consultants advise on integrating data protection principles from the ground up in new products, processes, and systems.

auditPreparation.title: Audit Preparation and Documentation
auditPreparation.description: Interim consultants help with creating or refining privacy policies and ensuring alignment with regulatory standards.

vendorCompliance.title: Third-Party and Vendor Compliance Management
vendorCompliance.description: Our consultants evaluate third-party data practices, conduct vendor risk assessments, and ensure data protection clauses are integrated into contracts.

dpoServices.title: DPO (Data Protection Officer) Services
dpoServices.description: For organizations that require a DPO but lack an internal candidate, interim consultants can step in as a temporary DPO.

valuePoints.expertiseGaps: Offer an effective solution to address expertise gaps
valuePoints.strategicGoals: Support strategic goals on a temporary basis
valuePoints.flexibleAsset: Are a flexible and valuable asset across multiple sectors
valuePoints.experiencedProfessionals: Highly experienced professionals with expertise from various sectors, assigned to work as an integrated part of your team
valuePoints.quickOnboarding: Quick onboarding and a very smooth hand-over back to you, upon the completion of the term

first.title: EMPOWERING SUCCESS TROUGH STRATEGIC CONSULTING AND HANDS-ON SOLUTIONS
first.text: At Nordic Data Compliance Centre, we excel at making legal and information security challenges more manageable for businesses. Our dedicated, forward-thinking team is committed to enhancing data compliance standards, supporting each company's unique needs along the way. By fostering strong partnerships with stakeholders and embracing a proactive, accountable approach, we aim to deliver meaningful value and reliable support.

second.title: UNIQUE APPROACH
second.subtitle: Simplicity and Transparency
second.text: We pride ourselves on providing innovative strategies and solutions to meet your business needs effectively. Our team thinks outside the box to deliver fresh and unique consulting and hands-on services. With our innovative approach, we aim to bring a new perspective to your business challenges, helping you achieve outstanding results and stay ahead of the competition.

about.title: EMPOWERING SUCCESS TROUGH STRATEGIC CONSULTING AND HANDS-ON SOLUTIONS
text: At Nordic Data Compliance Centre, we excel at making legal and information security challenges more manageable for businesses. Our dedicated, forward-thinking team is committed to enhancing data compliance standards, supporting each company's unique needs along the way. By fostering strong partnerships with stakeholders and embracing a proactive, accountable approach, we aim to deliver meaningful value and reliable support.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive Data Compliance Solutions
text: We offer a wide range of data compliance services tailored to your specific needs.
From GDPR implementation to ongoing compliance management, our solutions are designed to be practical and effective.
Our team of experts works closely with you to understand your unique challenges and develop customized strategies.

approach.title: UNIQUE APPROACH
approach.subtitle: Simplicity and Transparency
text: We pride ourselves on providing innovative strategies and solutions to meet your business needs effectively.
Our team thinks outside the box to deliver fresh and unique consulting and hands-on services.
With our innovative approach, we aim to bring a new perspective to your business challenges, helping you achieve outstanding results and stay ahead of the competition.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: Let's Discuss Your Needs
text: Ready to take your data compliance to the next level?
Contact us today to schedule a free consultation and learn how we can help your business achieve and maintain compliance.
Our team is ready to answer your questions and provide the guidance you need.

specializedProjects.title: We'll navigate the complexities of data compliance together
specializedProjects.runProject: We can run the project for you or team up with you to:
specializedProjects.addValue: How Can We Add Value to Your Company?
text: We provide consultancy and hands-on practical solutions in specialized projects related to the e.g GDPR, DORA, NIS2, ISO27001, AI-Act/ISO 42001. The specialized projects often focus on implementing, improving, or evaluating compliance measures, in response to the evolving data compliance landscape.
These projects may range from advanced technical solutions to complex organizational policy adjustments and often include cross-functional collaboration.
We adhere to international standards, as well as EU, local, and sector-specific laws and best practices relevant to the country where your business operates.
Our adaptable frameworks can be customized to meet the unique requirements of various industries.

list.strengthen: Proactively strengthen the overall approach to data compliance
list.buildTrust: Build trust with users and stakeholders
list.developPractices: Develop robust and sustainable information security practices
list.createCulture: Create a culture of continuous improvement and ensure resilience against emerging threats
list.accessProfessionals: Access to highly qualified professionals to assist with your project either as project managers or integrated team members
list.customizedFramework: A customized framework designed specifically for your business and industry
list.pragmaticApproach: A pragmatic approach to address the risks and gaps of any organization in any sector
list.handsOnSolutions: Hands-on solutions that ensure ongoing compliance and business continuity
list.strengthenResilience: Strengthen operational resilience and establish robust governance structures

aiActProjects.title: AI ACT Projects
text: Specialized projects focused on the AI Act often revolve around implementing compliance strategies, creating robust AI governance structures, and enhancing transparency and accountability in AI development. These projects facilitate compliance while fostering innovation and trust in AI systems.
Your project remains fully compliant throughout all phases, from concept development to the go-live stage.
Our framework also includes an ethical approach to building trustworthy AI systems, that contribute to benefits for people, organizations and ecosystems.

mixAndMatch.title: GDPR Mix and Match
text: This solution is designed for Start-up, Micro, and SME businesses, offering tailored solutions that enable these companies to build their own data compliance framework at their own pace. It is aligned with their unique needs and flexible enough to grow alongside their business.
When you choose this solution, we work as an integrated part of your team.

itServices.title: NEARSHORE IT INTERIM SERVICES
text: Nearshore IT interim services such as e.g. developers, testers, and supporters for temporary solutions.
We provide high-level IT expertise to businesses in need of immediate support to fill short-term gaps, manage projects, or steer IT strategy during transitions.
